def: to put things into your bag
ex: I pack my bag for school.

def: to get on the bus in time
ex: I catch the bus at eight.

def: to eat a small amount of food
ex: We have a snack after school.

def: to work on a task for school
ex: I do a project with my friend.

def: to give food to the cat
ex: I feed the cat in the morning.
I water the plants on Sunday.

def: to prepare the table for a meal
ex: I set the table for dinner.
ex_kor: 나는 저녁 식사를 위해 식탁을 차려요.

def: to make your hair neat with a brush
ex: I brush my hair before school.
ex_kor: 나는 학교 가기 전에 머리를 빗어요.

def: to stretch your body to warm up
ex: We do stretches in P.E. class.

def: to give power to your tablet
ex: I charge my tablet at night.
